title.rendered: Plant-Based Daily Superfood + Probiotics and Digestive Enzymes

content.rendered:
About the Product

  • GREEN SUPERFOOD: Contains over 70 ingredients, 25 billion probiotics, enzymes, fruits & vegetables, liver support, vitamins, trace minerals, skeletal support, and adaptogens. It is the green food that started the category in 1992.
  • THE MISSING LINK: Modern foods provide fewer micronutrients, and we’re often living much more sedentary lives than our Paleolithic ancestors. Green Vibrance helps fill in gaps in our nutrition and health due to our modern lives and food system.
  • ACHIEVE PEAK HEALTH: Green Vibrance addresses the four foundations of health – Digestion, Immunity, Nutrition, and Circulation. Find your healthy balance through this comprehensive formula.
  • EASY NUTRITION: It’s a challenge to integrate the nutrition we need to feel our best into our busy day to day. Green Vibrance is a one-stop solution, simple to drink added to your beverage of choice. Add it to your smoothie and take your greens to go.
  • TRUTH, TRUST, AND TRANSPARENCY: You will find no misleading proprietary blends with Vibrant Health. We fully disclose each ingredient by dose in every product we manufacture.


Green Vibrance Maximum Vibrance Field of Greens

Free Of Dairy, Soy, Added Sugar, GMOs, and Gluten Dairy, Soy, Added Sugar, GMOs, and Gluten Dairy, Soy, Added Sugar, GMOs, and Gluten
Ideal If You are looking for a daily superfood supplement with the added boost of Probiotics, Enzymes, and much, much more. You are looking for a single, superior superfood supplement to take in place of the rest. A great option for meal replacement. You are looking for a 100% Raw, Kosher, Vegan approved greens supplement. Great for detox and cleansing diets.
